resources.string: Here is a really useful tip about the app \nAnd it runs on two lines

string-array.name: usage_tips
string-array.item: Tap on details in the Pokémon detail page to view more information
Swipe from right to left in the Pokédex to filter (or click the filter icon)
Buy the Pro version to compare Pokémon, make a Favourites list, filter and search, and more!
Long press a Pokémon in the list for quick actions
We get our data from an open-source project called \'veekun\'. \nFind it on github.com/veekun/pokedex
Want to help us translate this app into your language? Go to the About page for details
Try searching for Charizard in a different language (how about searching \'Glurak\'?)
Email us your ideas and suggestions. See the About page for more details
You can change the colour of the Pokémon detail screen in Settings
Looking for Pokémon images? Go to Settings and check \"Enable Pokémon images\"
To view a Pokémon image more closely, tap on it
